group_1.textRight: Um, the review meeting you mentioned...

group_1.textLeft: I don't intend to blame anyone or anything.
Let's have a cup of tea and figure out if there's@anything we can work on next time.

group_1.textRight: ...It wasn't a bad plan, was it?
Madoka and I held back the hordes of Familiars.
And when the Witch is tied down@by Mami's ribbons,
Homura's bomb would take it out with a bang!

group_1.textLeft: It went perfectly up to Mami's turn,@but my bomb wasn't powerful enough...
Whether it's disabling the enemy or finishing@them off,
Mami did all of it...
You don't need to mind that.
Before fighting alongside all of you,
I used to do everything by myself.

group_1.textRight: You were already active when I became@a Magical Girl.
I can't imagine what it's like to protect a town@all by yourself.
I know... Even with a team, it can still be@pretty dangerous.

group_1.textLeft: It's hardly a pleasant experience,
but I'm sure all of you understand that.
We can't even tell the truth to the people@we saved.
"We rescued you from a Witch..."@We can't say such a thing, yes?
Indeed.
I'd be lying if I said it wasn't lonely.

group_1.textRight: Even though you were the one protecting@the town...
Hey, just out of curiosity...@That Witch back there...
If you were to take it on alone...

group_1.textLeft: ...It would go just as we'd done.@First, I'd take out the Familiars,
Then, once the Witch is tied up by my ribbons,@I'd finish it off with one big move.

group_1.textRight: You can do pretty much anything.@You don't need us...

group_1.textLeft: Goodness, that's not true.
When you're on your own, you can't afford@to make even the slightest mistake.
There have been many times when I thought@I would never make it.
Yes, that's why...
Just having you all here is very reassuring.
To have you all grow and fight with me@like this...
I'm very grateful for that.
